description:
A master in the Art of Fusion, respecting the tradition and creative vision of the 21st century, Swiss watchmaker Hublot places innovation at the heart of its growth strategy. Driven by a young spirit, resolutely looking to the future, Hublot's teams are constantly looking for innovative concepts, which is Hublot’s trademark. Beyond the development of major watchmaking complications, Hublot is associated with the biggest names in the world of sport, through collaborations with FIFA, UEFA, Kylian Mbappé, Usain Bolt, Novak Djokovic and many more. Hublot touches on many varied fields including music - with the famous virtuoso pianist Lang Lang as well as DJ Snake - and art with Takashi Murakami or Sang Bleu, among others.

Hublot of America is seeking a Senior Partnerships and Brand Activation Manager to join the marketing team. Reporting to the Strategic Partnerships and Brand Activation Director will spearhead our experiential marketing and partnerships to elevate our brand presence, deepen customer engagement, and achieve our business objectives. The individual will lead our efforts in creating compelling brand experiences and managing strategic partnerships with (Partners, Ambassadors, and Friends of the Brand), bringing Hublot to life through innovative collaborations, events, and activations to drive brand awareness and engagement.

ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS
• Implement a comprehensive brand activation strategy that seamlessly integrates strategic partnerships and experiential marketing
• Identify, negotiate, and manage partnerships with brands, influencers, and celebrities that align with Hublot’s values and enhances brand visibility
• Oversee the planning, execution and evolution of all experiential marketing initiatives, including events, product launches, and in-store activations
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams in Media and Sales to ensure cohesive brand image and experience across all touchpoints
• Manage budgets and resources effectively, ensuring the delivery of high-impact, cost efficient brand experiences
• Measure and report on the on the effectiveness of partnerships and brand activation initiatives, levering insights to inform future strategies
• Lead, mentor, and develop the brand activation team, fostering a culture of excellence and continuous improvement
• Stay current with thought leadership, industry trends, and competitive strategies that can translate into new ideas and opportunities

PROFILE
• Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business or a related field, preferred
• 5+ years of relevant experience in luxury and sports, entertainment activation, experiential marketing, or partnerships/sponsorships
• Proven track record in planning and executing high-profile events and activations
• Strong experience in building, maintaining, and maximizing strategic partnerships
• Exceptional leadership skills with the ability to manage and motivate a team
• Excellent project management, communication, and negotiation skills
• Creative, strategic thinker with an analytical approach
• Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
